root.name: Pucca's Restaurant
root.description: Playing as Pucca and her friends you need to manage a restaurant and serve customers in this iPhone game. There are 60 recipes so far, and constant updates to the app. You can add friends and visit neighbors in their own restaurants, and gain points as well as swapping gifts. This game focusses on customizing your own restaurant so it is aesthetically themed to your own tastes and liking.It has Game Center support, as well as in-game achievements for hidden items. You can share updates on Facebook or Twitter.
